name: Ext_R5_MedicationAdministration_reason
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.MedicationAdministration.reason for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicationAdministration.reason from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicationAdministration|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Concept, condition or observation that supports why the medication was administered
element.definition: A code, Condition or observation that supports why the medication was administered.
element.comment: `MedicationAdministration.reasonCode` maps to R4 `MedicationAdministration.reasonCode`. So is mapped as Equivalent. `MedicationAdministration.reasonReference` maps to R4 `MedicationAdministration.reasonReference`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
